description: Try our easy to follow Slow Cooker Pea & Ham Soup recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Slow Cooker Pea & Ham Soup Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Ladle soup into bowls. Top with remaining ham and peas, and parsley leaves. Serve with sourdough.
